txt.en: 'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'The effort that we all have provided takes its strain on our provisions. I worry that our stores will be empty soon! We must head to the wilds of Misthallow and hunt the beasts there for meat!'
Your mission is to hunt in the wilds and gather meat.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Misthallow.
Monsters in this mission will enrage at low morale, gaining attack strength and attack speed.
You have been tasked with hunting for meats to feed the war efforts.
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Steel Keep. Happy hunting, my friend!'
'Well done! With these meats, we will prevail and not starve!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
Meat is needed to feed those in the war efforts….\n\nYour mission is to hunt in the wilds and gather meat.
